detail_desc: Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and a back pocket. Relaxed fit with tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Scarf in patterned silk that can also be worn as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Skirt in glitter-print tulle with a glittery elastic waistband and sewn-on bow. Lined.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and short legs with frilled hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
V-neck blouse in softly draping silk with a small stand-up collar, and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Shirt in sturdy cotton denim with a tapered waist. Pointed collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy viscose and linen weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in soft velvet with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves and a yoke. Lined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Fine-knit jumper in soft wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and dropped shoulders.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, gently tapered legs with creases. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Narrow metal rings in various designs.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, decorative chest pockets and front pockets with a metal button. No buttons. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Jersey body with a yoke, long, mesh sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of trousers and a hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a ribbed hem.

Dungaree shorts in cotton denim. Adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a two-part chest pocket, one side with a flap and press-stud, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides.
Single-breasted, oversized jacket in woven fabric with wide notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Concealed fastening at the front and cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.
Short, wide turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, an opening and button at the back of the neck and slits with lacing in the sides.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in airy cotton poplin with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Yoke with inset lace trims at the front and pin-tucks at the top and long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Hand-sewn coat in felted wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide lace trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Super push-up lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Wide, straight-cut leather tunic with an opening at the top, dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves with cuffs. High slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in cotton twill with a collar with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Loose yoke front and back with a button, shoulder tabs with a button, an adjustable belt with a buckle at the waist and an adjustable tab with a buckle at the cuffs. Two inner pockets with a button, and a high-cut single back vent with a concealed button. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Opening and covered button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back, and a seam at the waist with pleats. Partly lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, frills and concealed buttons at the front, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Chinos in cotton twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and button, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Hat in paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Top in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves with stripes down the sides, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a straight cut hem with slits in the sides.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt jacket in rustly nylon with a turn-down collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with press-studs. Unlined.
Long hoodie in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck with buttons at the front, short sleeves and decorative seams front and back.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with a braid made of plastic beads, rhinestones and fabric.
Cropped top in crushed velvet with a round neck and short sleeves.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length skirt in airy, sequined stretch mesh. Low waist with wide, concealed elastication, a draped detail with gathers at the front, an asymmetric hem and a slit at the front. Lined.
Leather card holder with four card compartments and one note compartment. Size 7x9.5 cm.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide, ankle-length trousers woven in a linen blend with a high waist, tie belt, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, and side pockets.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood in a contrasting colour, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Fully-lined, textured, patterned swimming trunks with elastication at the waist and hems.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps, a straight cut at the top and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Striped, single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a roll-edge neckline and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbed hem with slits in the sides.
